2025-01-15 14:46:40.078 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "Event" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "CreatorId" integer NOT NULL,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "Type" text,
    "Place" text,
    "Time" timestamp with time zone,
    "Budget" numeric,
    "PeopleCount" integer,
    "Description" text,
    "PhotoPreview" text,
    "Address" text,
    "Draft" boolean NOT NULL,
    "PollEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "GeoEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Event" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);
2025-01-15 14:46:40.081 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "EventParticipant" (
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_EventParticipant" PRIMARY KEY ("EventId", "ProfileId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_EventParticipant_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
2025-01-15 14:46:40.083 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "Poll" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PreferredDates" text NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Poll" PRIMARY KEY ("Id"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Poll_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE "Event" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "CreatorId" integer NOT NULL,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "Type" text,
    "Place" text,
    "Time" timestamp with time zone,
    "Budget" numeric,
    "PeopleCount" integer,
    "Description" text,
    "PhotoPreview" text,
    "Address" text,
    "Draft" boolean NOT NULL,
    "PollEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "GeoEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Event" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);
2025-01-15 15:07:04.103 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "EventParticipant" (
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_EventParticipant" PRIMARY KEY ("EventId", "ProfileId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_EventParticipant_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
2025-01-15 15:07:04.105 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "Poll" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PreferredDates" text NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Poll" PRIMARY KEY ("Id"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Poll_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

2025-01-15 15:09:25.133 +00:00 [WRN] Compiling a query which loads related collections for more than one collection navigation, either via 'Include' or through projection, but no 'QuerySplittingBehavior' has been configured. By default, Entity Framework will use 'QuerySplittingBehavior.SingleQuery', which can potentially result in slow query performance. See https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134277 for more information. To identify the query that's triggering this warning call 'ConfigureWarnings(w => w.Throw(RelationalEventId.MultipleCollectionIncludeWarning))'.
2025-01-15 15:09:25.220 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (61ms) [Parameters=[@__ids_0='?' (DbType = Object)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Address", t."Budget", t."Created", t."CreatorId", t."Description", t."Draft", t."GeoEnabled", t."LastModified", t."Name", t."PeopleCount", t."PhotoPreview", t."Place", t."PollEnabled", t."Time", t."Type", p."Id", p."Created", p."EventId", p."LastModified", p."PreferredDates", p."ProfileId", e0."EventId", e0."ProfileId"
FROM (
    SELECT e."Id", e."Address", e."Budget", e."Created", e."CreatorId", e."Description", e."Draft", e."GeoEnabled", e."LastModified", e."Name", e."PeopleCount", e."PhotoPreview", e."Place", e."PollEnabled", e."Time", e."Type"
    FROM "Event" AS e
    WHERE e."Id" = ANY (@__ids_0)
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "Poll" AS p ON t."Id" = p."EventId"
LEFT JOIN "EventParticipant" AS e0 ON t."Id" = e0."EventId"
ORDER BY t."Id", p."Id", e0."EventId"

    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PreferredDates" text NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Poll" PRIMARY KEY ("Id"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Poll_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE "Event" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "CreatorId" integer NOT NULL,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "Type" text,
    "Place" text,
    "Time" timestamp with time zone,
    "Budget" numeric,
    "PeopleCount" integer,
    "Description" text,
    "PhotoPreview" text,
    "Address" text,
    "Draft" boolean NOT NULL,
    "PollEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "GeoEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Event" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);
2025-01-15 16:50:16.734 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "EventParticipant" (
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_EventParticipant" PRIMARY KEY ("EventId", "ProfileId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_EventParticipant_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
2025-01-15 16:50:16.737 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "Poll" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PreferredDates" text NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Poll" PRIMARY KEY ("Id"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Poll_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE "Event" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "CreatorId" integer NOT NULL,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "Type" text,
    "Place" text,
    "Time" timestamp with time zone,
    "Budget" numeric,
    "PeopleCount" integer,
    "Description" text,
    "PhotoPreview" text,
    "Address" text,
    "Draft" boolean NOT NULL,
    "PollEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "GeoEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Event" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);

CREATE TABLE "Poll" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PreferredDates" text NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Poll" PRIMARY KEY ("Id"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Poll_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE "Event" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "CreatorId" integer NOT NULL,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "Type" text,
    "Place" text,
    "Time" timestamp with time zone,
    "Budget" numeric,
    "PeopleCount" integer,
    "Description" text,
    "PhotoPreview" text,
    "Address" text,
    "Draft" boolean NOT NULL,
    "PollEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "GeoEnabled" boolean NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Event" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);

    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_EventParticipant" PRIMARY KEY ("EventId", "ProfileId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_EventParticipant_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);
2025-01-15 17:18:01.479 +00:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "Poll" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "EventId" integer NOT NULL,
    "ProfileId" integer NOT NULL,
    "PreferredDates" text NOT NULL,
    "Created" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "LastModified" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Poll" PRIMARY KEY ("Id"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Poll_Event_EventId" FOREIGN KEY ("EventId") REFERENCES "Event" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

SELECT t."Id", t."Address", t."Budget", t."Created", t."CreatorId", t."Description", t."Draft", t."GeoEnabled", t."LastModified", t."Name", t."PeopleCount", t."PhotoPreview", t."Place", t."PollEnabled", t."Time", t."Type", p."Id", p."Created", p."EventId", p."LastModified", p."PreferredDates", p."ProfileId", e0."EventId", e0."ProfileId"

    SELECT e."Id", e."Address", e."Budget", e."Created", e."CreatorId", e."Description", e."Draft", e."GeoEnabled", e."LastModified", e."Name", e."PeopleCount", e."PhotoPreview", e."Place", e."PollEnabled", e."Time", e."Type"

    WHERE e."Id" = ANY (@__ids_0)
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "Poll" AS p ON t."Id" = p."EventId"
LEFT JOIN "EventParticipant" AS e0 ON t."Id" = e0."EventId"
